name: OzGrind Virtual Reality Showroom
description: Brick and Mortar is so old school. Let's get digital! Expand your showroom infinitely with a Viewport Virtual Reality Showroom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel I5-6500 equivalent or above Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 equivalent or above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel I7-4770 equivalent or above Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 equivalent or above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
